name: Better Together (PisKafir)
description:
This is Better Together!

Being alone until now helps me when I am not alone from now on. Although sociability steals a certain amount of time from me, it allows me to master different views as an individual. Even if people join my adventure later on, including me, they eventually have to be alone to fulfill their own desires.

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D

Run: Shift   

Jump: Space

Camera Control: Mouse

How to Play (Multi-Player)

Add this game's .EXE to Steam as non-steam game and start it with the Steam. If you don't know how to do that, here is a link: https://help.steampowered.com/tr/faqs/view/4B8B-9697-2338-40EC

 After choosing "Play with a friend", one player should invite the other through steam and other player(s) should wait for the invite at the "Play with a friend" menu.

After that, different players will control different buttons for character control. Have fun!
